Package gameplay

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Controller
    Handles user key input and binds it to the input list
    Input
    Abstract class to handle KeyCode inputs;
    Map
    Contains details concerning the current map in play, and determines if a collision has occurred.
    MovePlayerDown
    Moves player in downward direction
    MovePlayerLeft
    Moves player in left direction
    MovePlayerRight
    Moves player in right direction
    MovePlayerUp
    Moves player in up direction
    Player
    Contains details concerning a Player's in-game information.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    Player.Direction
